alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 4:48AM EST until March 12 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Central Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Thomas County in south central Georgia... * Until 600 AM EST. * At 448 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pelham to 12 miles southeast of Blountstown, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Quincy, Tallahassee, Havana, St. Marks, Midway, Woodville, Crawfordville, Cairo, Boston, Ochlocknee, Pavo, Coolidge, Whigham, Florida State University, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Greensboro, Florida A And M and Orange. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM EST for Big Bend of Florida...and south central and southwestern Georgia. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
